ComicInfo.Title: Under the Raptor's Wings [Part 1]
ComicInfo.Summary: Under the Raptor's Wings [Part 1]: Spock is accidentally transported to Vulcan's past to the time when Surak was about to unite the planet by banishing emotions from Vulcans. Spock finds actual events differ than what the history books portrayed and finds himself siding with Vulcans who reject Surak's teachings. Meanwhile in the present, Captain Kirk and the Enterprise find themselves in an altered timeline where they are attacked by a Vulcan fleet with Romulan influences.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-17 15:24:16. [CVDB849829] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:47:10. [Issue ID 2224158]
